## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [applyColour()](./blockly.icon_class.applycolour_1_method.md) |  | Change the colour of the associated bubble to match its block. |
|  [computeIconLocation()](./blockly.icon_class.computeiconlocation_1_method.md) |  | Notification that the icon has moved, but we don't really know where. Recompute the icon's location from scratch. |
|  [createIcon()](./blockly.icon_class.createicon_1_method.md) |  | Create the icon on the block. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.icon_class.dispose_1_method.md) |  | Dispose of this icon. |
|  [drawIcon\_(\_group)](./blockly.icon_class.drawicon__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Draw the icon. |
|  [getBlock()](./blockly.icon_class.getblock_1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [getCorrectedSize()](./blockly.icon_class.getcorrectedsize_1_method.md) |  | Get the size of the icon as used for rendering. This differs from the actual size of the icon, because it bulges slightly out of its row rather than increasing the height of its row. |
|  [getIconLocation()](./blockly.icon_class.geticonlocation_1_method.md) |  | Returns the center of the block's icon relative to the surface. |
|  [iconClick\_(e)](./blockly.icon_class.iconclick__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Clicking on the icon toggles if the bubble is visible. |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.icon_class.isvisible_1_method.md) |  | Is the associated bubble visible? |
|  [setIconLocation(xy)](./blockly.icon_class.seticonlocation_1_method.md) |  | Notification that the icon has moved. Update the arrow accordingly. |
|  [setVisible(\_visible)](./blockly.icon_class.setvisible_1_method.md) |  | Show or hide the bubble. |
|  [updateEditable()](./blockly.icon_class.updateeditable_1_method.md) |  | Add or remove the UI indicating if this icon may be clicked or not. |
